entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:48 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 07:48 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
